channel.title: Zenith, How to set custom loyalty titles?
channel.description:
Hey i'm pretty new to the newer rsps revisions and i wanted to set a loyaty title so when i talk it ill be like owner (name, text) using zenith source and client. Can someone please tell me how to do this?
thanks

item.title: Zenith, How to set custom loyalty titles?
item.dc:creator: @Quakajack Quakajack
item.description:
@Quakajack wrote:

Yes, it does have a title comand but i want to add a custom one to the list like if i go ;;title (id) then i will have the title “owner” or admin ones for my admins

Read full topic
item.source: Zenith, How to set custom loyalty titles?

item.title: Zenith, How to set custom loyalty titles?
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

doesn’t zenith already have titles? i am pretty sure there is a command, try something like ::title 1 etc

Read full topic
